metadata.title: CVE-2014-1624 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Race condition in the xdg.BaseDirectory.get_runtime_dir function inpython-xdg 0.25 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files bypre-creating /tmp/pyxdg-runtime-dir-fallback-victim to point to avictim-owned location, then replacing it with a symlink to anattacker-controlled location once the get_runtime_dir function is called.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1624` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-xdg - 0.25-4
python3-xdg - 0.25-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pyxdg package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.25-4').
